bio.summary: Sohail Shriyan is a highly motivated and versatile individual who is always eager to take on new challenges.  He is passionate about learning and committed to producing high-quality work.  Sohail possesses a positive attitude and a growth mindset, enabling him to make meaningful contributions.

achievements.desc: Currently pursuing a Bachelor of Science in Information Technology at Vivek College of Commerce, Goregoan-west.
achievements.degree: Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

achievements.school: Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Vidyalaya and Jr. College
achievements.desc: Completed class 12 high school education at Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel Vidyalaya and Jr. College, where I studied Science with Information Technology.
Completed class 10 education at St.Francis D'Assisi High School, Borivali-west where I studied Science with Computer Application.

achievements.title: Image Restoration
achievements.description: A faded, black-and-white photograph with yellowing edges and small tears is meticulously restored to its original state.

achievements.title: Digital Art
achievements.description: A vibrant digital painting of an old Indian monk with a radiant aura.

achievements.title: Thumbnail Editor
achievements.description: A feature that allows you to add guest photos to thumbnails, with easy-to-use cropping and masking tools.

achievements.title: Video Editor
achievements.description: Easily arrange multi-cam video feeds for interview-style podcasts, enabling you to switch between speaker views, split screens, or picture-in-picture layouts.

achievements.title: 3D Modeling and Texturing
achievements.description: A sleek, minimalist living room with clean lines and a monochromatic color palette.

achievements.title: 3D Modeling and Texturing
achievements.description: A medieval shield model with realistic damage and wear from countless battles.
